comments:
Version 3.1.M2

I performed a file search in a working set and got the
"java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException: ISO-8859-11" as pasted below on the console. 

I have XML files in my working set with many different encodings. I have no idea
if my file search completed or if it stopped on this error. I see that Java
1.4.2's lib/charset.jar
(http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/guide/intl/encoding.doc.html) does not
support ISO-8859-11, but that Java 1.5.0 does. 

What I really need is for the search to *complete* whether an encoding is
present or not for some random file in my 12,000+ pile of files.
